question1.title: Are you more concerned about paying off debts with high interest rates or low interest rates first?

question2.title: Do you prefer to see quick progress by paying off smaller debts first?

question3.title: Are you motivated by the idea of saving money on interest in the long run?

question4.title: Are you able to pay more than the minimum payment on your debts each month?

answers.yes: Yes, I can pay more than the minimum

answers.no: No, I can only afford the minimum payment

question5.title: How would you feel about having one less debt to worry about?

question6.title: How important is it for you to feel a sense of accomplishment in paying off your debts?

question7.title: Would you prefer a debt repayment strategy that allows for more flexibility in your monthly payments?

question8.title: Are there any specific debts you would like to prioritize for repayment (e.g., credit card debt, student loans, etc.)?

question9.title: How do you feel about the idea of adjusting your debt repayment strategy based on your financial circumstances?
